headline: Consumers Are Struggling. Could Buying This Dollar-Store Stock Be a Brilliant Move?
summary: Challenges to consumer spending are mounting. Here's what that means for investors.

content.title: Consumers Are Struggling. Could Buying This Dollar-Store Stock Be a Brilliant Move?

headline: Walmart CEO announces plans to retire in 2026: What to know
summary: Walmart (WMT) CEO Doug McMillon announced his plans to retire at the end of January 2026, to be succeeded in his chief executive role by Walmart US CEO John Furner. Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi asks a panel consisting of Mariner Wealth Advisors chief investment strategist and head of equities Jeff Krumpelman and Yahoo Finance senior reporters Allie Canal and Ines Ferré about their thoughts on the news and what this leadership change means for the retail giant. Walmart is currently scheduled to report quarterly earnings results on Thursday, November 20. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Walmart CEO announces plans to retire in 2026: What to know
content.description:
Walmart (WMT) CEO Doug McMillon announced his plans to retire at the end of January 2026, to be succeeded in his chief executive role by Walmart US CEO John Furner.

Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi asks a panel consisting of Mariner Wealth Advisors chief investment strategist and head of equities Jeff Krumpelman and Yahoo Finance senior reporters Allie Canal and Ines Ferré about their thoughts on the news and what this leadership change means for the retail giant.

Walmart is currently scheduled to report quarterly earnings results on Thursday, November 20.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
